issue.title: [JS] Correct package exports
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14774](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14774). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should add correct exports also for browsers. Right now, `exports` overrules `browser` rewrites. 

See https://webpack.js.org/guides/package-exports/

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14774?focusedCommentId=17446660) by Dominik Moritz (domoritz):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11742
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11742>
